title: Binance Lays Off Dozens of Employees With Plans To Trim US Workforce Amid Regulatory Pressure: Report
description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange by trading volume is reportedly downsizing amid mounting pressure from federal investigations.  The Wall Street Journal reports that Binance already terminated dozens of its employees last week, some of whom were told their jobs were redundant while others were let go without any reason at all. The report also says […]
